class.name: GLTFDocumentExtensionConvertImporterMesh
class.brief_description: A default [GLTFDocumentExtension] to convert [ImporterMeshInstance3D] nodes to [MeshInstance3D].
class.description: This [GLTFDocumentExtension] is installed by default at runtime, but not in the editor. It converts all [ImporterMeshInstance3D] nodes and related [ImporterMesh] resources to [MeshInstance3D] nodes with [ArrayMesh] resources. If it is important for a custom [GLTFDocumentExtension] to work with [ImporterMesh] at runtime, it is recommended to call [method GLTFDocument.register_gltf_document_extension] with the [code]true[/code] argument to ensure it runs before this built-in extension.
